text:
America’s children are suffering. Here’s what they’ve lost during Covid-19.

name: NBCNews
text:
In a special bonus episode of #DoNoHarm, from @NBCNews and @WonderyMedia, @Mike_Hixenbaugh talks with @LJBeil about what he’s learned about the child welfare system – and what happens when that system goes too far.
